description:
Enhances various aspects of the GNOME experience when using a touch device.

Current features:
  - Navigation bar (gestures and buttons mode), as knwon from Android
  - Touch gestures for notifications (dismiss, collapse, expand)
  - Make the notification area touch-scrollable
  - Onscreen Keyboard: key popups, extended keys, swipe to close.
  - Floating rotate button when auto-rotation is off, as known from Android
  - Overview and desktop background gestures (switch workspaces, open/close overview)
  - Overview window preview gestures (swipe up to close windows, hold+move to drag)

A lot more is planned, have a look at the roadmap for that: https://github.com/mityax/gnome-extension-touchup

If you find this extension valuable, please donate to make sure the work can go on! :)
name: TouchUp
